item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, August 18, 2024 at 8:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. [Opinion] Beware the professional ghetto
2. ‘People are horrified’: Moscow turns to reluctant conscripts to defend Kursk
3. Nigel Farage is Britain’s highest-earning MP, Commons records reveal
4. US arrest of cartel chief ‘El Mayo’ leaves Mexico rattled
5. Musk’s X to shut Brazilian operation in escalating clash with country’s supreme court
